abort.no_resources: No resources were returned for this instance.

error.ssl_rejection: Could not verify the SSL certificate

expose.description: Select the Proxmox instance nodes ans Virtual Machines (QEMU) and Containers (LXC) you want to expose

reauth_confirm.description: The username or password is invalid.
reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate Integration

import_already_configured.description:
The YAML configuration of instace {host}:{port} of {integration} (`{platform}`) already exists in the UI and was ignored on import.

You must remove this configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file and restart Home Assistant.
import_already_configured.title: The instance {host}:{port} already exists in the UI, can be removed

import_auth_error.description:
Importing YAML configuration from {host}:{port} instance of {integration} (`{platform}`) failed due to authentication error.

You must remove this configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file, restart Home Assistant and configure it manually.
import_auth_error.title: Error in importing YAML configuration from {host}:{port}

import_cant_connect.description:
Importing YAML configuration from {host}:{port} instance of {integration} (`{platform}`) failed due to connection failed.

You must remove this configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file, restart Home Assistant and configure it manually.
import_cant_connect.title: Error in importing YAML configuration from {host}:{port}

import_general_error.description:
Importing YAML configuration from {host}:{port} instance of {integration} (`{platform}`) failed due to unknown error.

You must remove this configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file, restart Home Assistant and configure it manually.
import_general_error.title: Error in importing YAML configuration from {host}:{port}

import_invalid_port.description:
Importing YAML configuration from {host}:{port} instance of {integration} (`{platform}`) failed due to invalid port.

You must remove this configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file, restart Home Assistant and configure it manually.
import_invalid_port.title: Error in importing YAML configuration from {host}:{port}

import_node_not_exist.description:
The {node} of the {host}:{port} instance of {integration} (`{platform}`) present in the YAML configuration does not exist in this instance and was ignored in the import.

You must remove this configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file and restart Home Assistant.
import_node_not_exist.title: Node {node} does not exist in {host}:{port}

import_ssl_rejection.description:
Importing YAML configuration from {host}:{port} instance of {integration} (`{platform}`) failed due to SSL rejection.

You must remove this configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file, restart Home Assistant and configure it manually.
import_ssl_rejection.title: Error in importing YAML configuration from {host}:{port}

import_success.description:
The YAML configuration of {host}:{port} instance of {integration} (`{platform}`) has been imported into the UI automatically.

Can be safely removed from your `configuration.yaml` file.
import_success.title: {host}:{port} was imported from YAML configuration

no_permissions.description:
The user `{user}` does not have the required permissions for all features.

The following features are not accessible by the user:
`{errors}`

Check the user permissions as described in the documentation.
no_permissions.title: User `{user}` does not have the required permissions

resource_exception_forbiden.description:
User {user} does not have sufficient permissions to access resource {resource}.

Please check documentation and user permissions.
resource_exception_forbiden.title: Permissions error for `{resource}`

resource_nonexistent.description:
{resource_type} {resource} does not exist on ({host}:{port}), remove it in integration options.

This can also be caused if the user doesn't have enough permission to access the resource.
resource_nonexistent.title: {resource_type} {resource} does not exist

yaml_deprecated.description:
Configuration of the {integration} (`{platform}`) in YAML is deprecated and should be removed in {version}.

Resolve the import issues and remove the YAML configuration from your `configuration.yaml` file.
yaml_deprecated.title: Configuration of the {integration} in YAML is deprecated

abort.no_nodes: No nodes were returned for the host.
abort.no_vms: There are no virtual machines or containers for this node, the configuration entry will be created for the node.

error.ssl_rejection: Could not verify the SSL certificate

change_expose.description: Select the Proxmox instance nodes ans Virtual Machines (QEMU) and Containers (LXC) you want to expose

menu_options.change_expose: Add or remove Nodes, VMs or Containers
